interact.title: Contract Interaction
interact.subtitle: Execute functions on registered smart contracts

errors.noAbi: This contract has no registered ABI. Please re-register the contract.
errors.networkError: Network error executing function '{{functionName}}' - Try again
errors.adminNotFound: Administrator address not configured for this contract - Contact the administrator
errors.functionFailed: Function '{{functionName}}' failed - Check if parameters are correct or if the function exists in the contract
errors.functionTimeout: Function '{{functionName}}' timed out - This function may not exist in the deployed contract or the network may be congested
errors.insufficientGas: Insufficient gas to execute '{{functionName}}' - Try increasing the gas limit
errors.functionNotFound: Function '{{functionName}}' was not found in the deployed contract
errors.transactionReverted: Transaction '{{functionName}}' was reverted by the contract - Check function conditions
errors.functionNotAvailable: Function '{{functionName}}' is not available in the deployed contract

tips.title: Tip
tips.adminRequired: This function requires administrator permissions in the smart contract. To execute functions with access control it is necessary to connect an admin wallet directly to the contract.
tips.exchangePrice: Exchange: Enter the price per token in cBRL. For example, "1.50" means 1.50 cBRL per token.
tips.matchingOrders: Matching: Enter order IDs separated by commas (e.g. "1,2,3"). These orders will be matched together.
tips.checkParameters: Check if all parameters are in the correct format and if you have the necessary permissions to execute this function.
tips.amountConversion: Tip: Enter whole numbers (e.g. "1" for 1 token). The system automatically converts to wei format.
tips.percentageFormat: Percentage: Enter the value multiplied by 100 (5.40% = 540, 10.48% = 1048). The value will be sent exactly as entered.
tips.slippageProtection: Slippage Protection: Enter the minimum amount you are willing to receive. Leave empty for no slippage protection.
tips.connectivityProblem: Connectivity problem. Wait a few seconds and try again.
tips.functionNotImplemented: This function may be defined in the ABI but not implemented in the deployed contract. Check if the contract was deployed with the latest version.

abiMissing.title: ABI not found
abiMissing.description: This contract was registered without ABI. Click the button below to add the default stake ABI.

placeholders.orderPrice: Enter price in cBRL (e.g. 1.25 for 1.25 cBRL per token)
placeholders.amountInWei: Enter amount (1 = 1 token, auto-converts to wei)
